title: Identify Test Types
description: Given a list of features, identify which test type (unit, integration, E2E) is most appropriate and where the test should live (commonTest, androidTest, iosTest).
hints: Unit tests are for pure logic with no external dependencies
Integration tests combine multiple components (e.g., repository + database)
Shared code in commonTest can run on JVM for speed

testCases.expectedBehavior: Correctly identify test types and locations for each feature
